thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower after jobs data
thread.title_full: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower after jobs data | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower after jobs data
text:
Aug 7 U.S. stocks opened lower on Friday after data showed steady job growth in July, increasing the chances Federal Reserve will raise interest rates in September.
The Dow Jones industrial average fell 30.64 points, or 0.18 percent, to 17,389.11, the S&P 500 lost 2.93 points, or 0.14 percent, to 2,080.63 and the Nasdaq composite dropped 13.94 points, or 0.28 percent, to 5,042.50. (Reporting by Abinaya Vijayaraghavan in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty)
